Text: game doesn't work for me, OS X 10.8. I installed the cxz engine but the game just sits in the dock for a little then disappears...

It may be a WineSkin wrap. DL WineSkin Winery & get the newest engine (WS9Wine1.5.10), Rclick the game .app & choose show contents, if it is a Wine wrap, run the Wineskin.app, click Advanced > Tools > Change Engine Used & select the new one & click OK. It will update it to the newest engine. Try it again. I've been using 1.4.1 myself on games I've made.

There are files in the "show package contents" called:

CXCustomEXEMaker
CXInstaller
CXRegedit
CXXwinecfg
CXWinetricks
MacOS
ReSources
root
SharedSupport

so should I install wineskin?
Also, I've installed all of the CXZ engines and nothing works still
How do i change the language on the game?
